title: Who is the best vocalist in Blackpink? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, let’s look at this objectively. Most people would probably rank their vocals as: RoseJennieJisooLisaHowever, this ranking is subject to a lot of controversy due to Blackpink’s recent 4D MR removed. In that performance, Rose’s voice sounded unnaturely strained while Lisa actually sounded the most stable. Many people tend to blame YG for “ruining” Rose’s voice by making her sing in a “unique” way. You can judge this for yourself by comparing her predebut clips to her current clips, but that’s not what we’re talking about now. Rose clearly demonstrated her vocal prowess in performances like the one on Masked Singer or Irreplaceable Duo, but in live performances with Blackpink her vocals often sound strained. In fact, in live performances Jennie is often the most stable and I believe that her vocals are healthier than Rose’s. Her voice never cracks and has a very unique, fierce tone to it as well. Jisoo never really struck me as a vocal powerhouse until her performance of Clarity at the Blackpink concert, in which she hit many high notes (but cracked a few). Her voice is very thin and husky, and isn’t as powerful as Jennie and Rose’s. So, I would say the best vocalist is between Jennie and Rose and it’s really up to you whether you like Jennie’s powerful tone or Rose’s honey-rich tone. However, I would say that Rose is probably the best vocalist because she has shown that she can sing much better than the others, but only when she is in good condition, which she isn’t in often, sadly.

For me,it would be : 1.Jisoo Her powerful deep voice and unique is the best female voice I ever heard.She also able to control her high and low note 2.Rose She has a unique voice and I love it but it seem that her voice when singing is not natural 3.Lisa She has a cute and beautiful voice 4.Jennie Her voice sounds great and powerful in all MVs but she sounds weaker when she sings in live NO HATING…JUST MY OPINION…Thanks for reading
